FOX News Channel (FNC) is a 24-hour all-encompassing news service delivering breaking news as well as political and business news. The number one network in cable, FNC has been the most-watched television news channel for 18 consecutive years. According to a 2020 Brand Keys Consumer Loyalty Engagement Index report, FOX News is the top brand in the country for morning and evening news coverage. A 2019 Suffolk University poll named FOX News as the most trusted source for television news or commentary, while a 2019 Brand Keys Emotion Engagement Analysis survey found that FOX News was the most trusted cable news brand. A 2017 Gallup/Knight Foundation survey also found that among Americans who could name an objective news source, FOX News was the top-cited outlet. Owned by FOX Corporation, FNC is available in nearly 90 million homes and dominates the cable news landscape, routinely notching the top ten programs in the genre.

entry.title: The Trump-Biden showdown is about to get stranger | FOX News Rundown

media:group.media:title: The Trump-Biden showdown is about to get stranger | FOX News Rundown
media:group.media:description:
Fox News Rundown podcast | Aug. 21, 2020 Get more episodes of the Fox News Rundown podcast here: https://bit.ly/37n2wbe
Subscribe to Fox News! https://bit.ly/2vBUvAS Watch more Fox News Video: http://video.foxnews.com Watch Fox News Channel Live: http://www.foxnewsgo.com/
Joe Biden accepted the Democratic nomination for President Thursday night, closing out the four-day Democratic National Convention with his pitch to Americans on why they should vote for him in November and end, as he calls it, this chapter of "American darkness." FOX News Radio's National Correspondent Jared Halpern and FOX News Radio Political Analyst Josh Kraushaar recap the final night with former Congressman Harold Ford Jr. (D-TN).
With the DNC at an end, the GOP now prepares for the Republican National Convention which will kick off next week. Chris Wallace, host of Fox News Sunday, attended his first presidential convention in 1964. Now 56 years later, he has covered several presidential campaigns -- none of which were like the one we're witnessing this year. Wallace discusses the conventions, the controversy over early voting and why he thinks election season will only continue to get stranger.
Don't miss the good news with Tonya J. Powers.
Plus, commentary by former Rep. Jason Chaffetz (R-UT).
The FOX News Rundown is a news-based daily morning podcast. Each morning, Jacqui Heinrich, Dave Anthony, Lisa Brady, Jessica Rosenthal and Chris Foster take a deep dive into the major and controversial stories of the day, tapping into the massive reporting resources of FOX News to provide a full picture of the news. You'll hear a contrast of perspectives you may not hear elsewhere while going far beyond the basic headlines. Each day The FOX News Rundown features insight from top newsmakers, along with FOX News reporters and contributors, plus a daily commentary on a significant issue of the day. Check us out each morning.
FOX News Channel (FNC) is a 24-hour all-encompassing news service delivering breaking news as well as political and business news. The number one network in cable, FNC has been the most-watched television news channel for 18 consecutive years. According to a 2020 Brand Keys Consumer Loyalty Engagement Index report, FOX News is the top brand in the country for morning and evening news coverage. A 2019 Suffolk University poll named FOX News as the most trusted source for television news or commentary, while a 2019 Brand Keys Emotion Engagement Analysis survey found that FOX News was the most trusted cable news brand. A 2017 Gallup/Knight Foundation survey also found that among Americans who could name an objective news source, FOX News was the top-cited outlet. Owned by FOX Corporation, FNC is available in nearly 90 million homes and dominates the cable news landscape, routinely notching the top ten programs in the genre.

entry.title: Sarah Sanders: RNC will be a very different convention

media:group.media:title: Sarah Sanders: RNC will be a very different convention
media:group.media:description:
Former White House press secretary and Fox News contributor Sarah Sanders reacts to the Democratic National Convention.
Subscribe to Fox News! https://bit.ly/2vBUvAS Watch more Fox News Video: http://video.foxnews.com Watch Fox News Channel Live: http://www.foxnewsgo.com/
FOX News Channel (FNC) is a 24-hour all-encompassing news service delivering breaking news as well as political and business news. The number one network in cable, FNC has been the most-watched television news channel for 18 consecutive years. According to a 2020 Brand Keys Consumer Loyalty Engagement Index report, FOX News is the top brand in the country for morning and evening news coverage. A 2019 Suffolk University poll named FOX News as the most trusted source for television news or commentary, while a 2019 Brand Keys Emotion Engagement Analysis survey found that FOX News was the most trusted cable news brand. A 2017 Gallup/Knight Foundation survey also found that among Americans who could name an objective news source, FOX News was the top-cited outlet. Owned by FOX Corporation, FNC is available in nearly 90 million homes and dominates the cable news landscape, routinely notching the top ten programs in the genre.

entry.title: Lori Loughlin’s husband sentenced to 5 months in prison in admissions scandal

media:group.media:title: Lori Loughlin’s husband sentenced to 5 months in prison in admissions scandal
media:group.media:description:
Lori Loughlin’s husband, fashion designer Mossimo Giannulli, was sentenced to five months in prison for his role in the college admissions scandal.
